name: Castle Looters
description:
This R.P.G. will keep you coming back for days! Join Knight_Boy and friends as they explore the endless Castle Ruins! Upgrade your gear, lvl Up, and fight cool monsters! Everything you could ever want in an R.P.G. and it's free and available offline!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Requires WinRar to open| This game is freeware.|

You ARE allowed to distribute this game all you want but publication under a false name is not tolerated. Any questions or concerns can be asked in the community board.

or you can fix it yourself in the game files.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
